Name: median_listing_price
Label: Median Listing Price
Description: The median listing price within the specified geography during the specified month.

Name: median_listing_price_mm
Label: Median Listing Price M/M
Description: The percentage change in the median listing price from the previous month.

Name: median_listing_price_yy
Label: Median Listing Price Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the median listing price from the same month in the previous year.

Name: active_listing_count
Label: Active Listing Count
Description: The count of active listings within the specified geography during the specified month. The active listing count tracks the number of for sale properties on the market, excluding pending listings where a pending status is available. This is a snapshot measure of how many active listings can be expected on any given day of the specified month.

Name: active_listing_count_mm
Label: Active Listing Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the active listing count from the previous month.

Name: active_listing_count_yy
Label: Active Listing Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the active listing count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: median_days_on_market
Label: Days on Market
Description: The median number of days property listings spend on the market within the specified geography during the specified month. Time spent on the market is defined as the time between the initial listing of a property and either its closing date or the date it is taken off the market.

Name: median_days_on_market_mm
Label: Days on Market M/M
Description: The percentage change in the median days on market from the previous month.

Name: median_days_on_market_yy
Label: Days on Market Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the median days on market from the same month in the previous year.

Name: new_listing_count
Label: New Listing Count
Description: The count of new listings added to the market within the specified geography. The new listing count represents a typical week’s worth of new listings in a given month. The new listing count can be multiplied by the number of weeks in a month to produce a monthly new listing count.

Name: new_listing_count_mm
Label: New Listing Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the new listing count from the previous month.

Name: new_listing_count_yy
Label: New Listing Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the new listing count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: price_increased_count
Label: Price Increase Count
Description: The count of listings which have had their price increased within the specified geography. The price increase count represents a typical week’s worth of listings which have had their price increased in a given month. The price increase count can be multiplied by the number of weeks in a month to produce a monthly price increase count.

Name: price_increased_count_mm
Label: Price Increase Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the price increase count from the previous month.

Name: price_increased_count_yy
Label: Price Increase Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the price increase count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: price_reduced_count
Label: Price Decrease Count
Description: The count of listings which have had their price reduced within the specified geography. The price decrease count represents a typical week’s worth of listings which have had their price reduced in a given month. The price decrease count can be multiplied by the number of weeks in a month to produce a monthly price decrease count.

Name: price_reduced_count_mm
Label: Price Decrease Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the price decrease count from the previous month.

Name: price_reduced_count_yy
Label: Price Decrease Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the price decrease count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: pending_listing_count
Label: Pending Listing Count
Description: The count of pending listings within the specified geography during the specified month, if a pending definition is available for that geography. This is a snapshot measure of how many pending listings can be expected on any given day of the specified month.

Name: pending_listing_count_mm
Label: Pending Listing Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the pending listing count from the previous month.

Name: pending_listing_count_yy
Label: Pending Listing Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the pending listing count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: median_listing_price_per_square_foot
Label: Median List Price Per Sqft
Description: The median listing price per square foot within the specified geography during the specified month.

Name: median_listing_price_per_square_foot_mm
Label: Median List Price Per Sqft M/M
Description: The percentage change in the median listing price per square foot from the previous month.

Name: median_listing_price_per_square_foot_yy
Label: Median List Price Per Sqft Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the median listing price per square foot from the same month in the previous year.

Name: median_square_feet
Label: Median Listing Sqft
Description: The median listing square feet within the specified geography during the specified month.

Name: median_square_feet_mm
Label: Median Listing Sqft M/M
Description: The percentage change in the median listing square feet from the previous month.

Name: median_square_feet_yy
Label: Median Listing Sqft Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the median listing square feet from the same month in the previous year.

Name: average_listing_price
Label: Avg Listing Price
Description: The average listing price within the specified geography during the specified month.

Name: average_listing_price_mm
Label: Avg Listing Price M/M
Description: The percentage change in the average listing price from the previous month.

Name: average_listing_price_yy
Label: Avg Listing Price Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the average listing price from the same month in the previous year.

Name: total_listing_count
Label: Total Listing Count
Description: The total of both active listings and pending listings within the specified geography during the specified month. This is a snapshot measure of how many total listings can be expected on any given day of the specified month.

Name: total_listing_count_mm
Label: Total Listing Count M/M
Description: The percentage change in the total listing count from the previous month.

Name: total_listing_count_yy
Label: Total Listing Count Y/Y
Description: The percentage change in the total listing count from the same month in the previous year.

Name: pending_ratio
Label: Pending Ratio
Description: The ratio of the pending listing count to the active listing count within the specified geography during the specified month.

Name: pending_ratio_mm
Label: Pending Ratio M/M
Description: The change in the pending ratio from the previous month.

Name: pending_ratio_yy
Label: Pending Ratio Y/Y
Description: The change in the pending ratio from the same month in the previous year.
